post.author: Brendan
post.content:
Hi Brendan,

It was really nice talking to you, If you could please forward the job description to your friend and hopefully he will contact me ASAP. The rate is between $40-45/hr depending on experience and if Incorporated or not.

Site Markham, Ont, Canada
Hours per Day 8
Hours per Week 40

Description
Highly experienced Programmer with significant experience in analysis and design. An extremely competent individual able to deliver highest quality code. Candidate will possess at least a minimum of 7 years of development experience and proven track record as a quick starter.

Qualifications:
Unix environment
Java programming
html/web programming
experience with Oracle and Oracle stored procedures

Must have:
Java (5+ yrs)
Oracle SQL*Plus  (4+ Yrs)
Servlets (1-2 yrs)

Nice to have:
JavaScript/HTML (1-2 yrs)
Eclipse  (1-2 yrs)
Solaris * (1-2 yrs)
Rational ClearCase (nice to have)
Unix shell scripting (nice to have)

Take care,

> Melanie Sapishchuk
> Resource Manager
> msapishchuk@cncglobal.com
post.title: J2EE int to sr developer
